item.title: 国航、南航最新从 Comac 购买 C919 飞机
item.description: 中国国家广播电视公司（CCTV）周三称，中国商飞准备向新运营商中国国际航空股份有限公司（Air China Ltd.）和中国南方航空股份有限公司（China Southern Airlines Co.【原文：China’s Comac is poised to hand over the first of two single-aisle C919 jets to new operators Air China Ltd. and China Southern Airlines Co., state broadcaster CCTV said Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国银行的西亚说：日本和中东企业转向东南亚
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）新加坡国家主管马丁-西亚（Martin Siah）表示，中东和日本公司正越来越多地将东南亚视为部署资本的首选目的地，因为它们将部分潜在投资从亚洲其他地区转移到了东南亚。【原文：Middle Eastern and Japanese companies are increasingly seeing Southeast Asia as a destination of choice to deploy capital as they pivot some of the potential investment away from the rest of Asia, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Singapore country head Martin Siah.】

item.title: Anchor 从 Legal & General 借贷 8,500 万英镑建造房屋
item.description: 在政府承诺大幅增加供应量后，护理之家和退休住房公司 Anchor 已向 Legal & General Assurance Society Ltd. 借款 8500 万英镑（1.125 亿美元），用于在英国建造经济适用房。【原文：Care home and retirement housing firm Anchor has borrowed £85 million ($112.5 million) from Legal & General Assurance Society Ltd. to build affordable housing in the UK after the government promised to dramatically boost supply.】

item.title: SAS 聘用诺和诺德前高管担任破产保护后航空公司主席
item.description: 北欧航空公司 SAS AB 完成了为期两年的重组，在美国破产保护程序中脱颖而出，拥有了新的董事长和所有者。【原文：Scandinavian airline SAS AB completed a two-year restructuring, emerging from a US Chapter 11 process with a new chairman and owners.】

item.description: 麒麟控股公司（Kirin Holdings Co.【原文：Kirin Holdings Co. again extended its tender offer deadline for Fancl Corp., as the Japanese brewer works to secure a deal for the Japanese skincare and health supplement maker.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数迎来第五个上涨日
item.description: 2024年1月3日，星期三，一名上班族走过位于英国伦敦金融城的伦敦证券交易所集团中庭。1984年1月3日推出的富时100指数是20世纪80年代改变伦敦金融城的众多创新之一。【原文：An office worker walks through the London Stock Exchange Group Plc's atrium in the City of London, UK, on Wednesday, Jan. 3, 2024. The FTSE 100, launched on Jan. 3, 1984, was one of many innovations that transformed the City of London in the 1980s.】

item.title: 瑞典诺巴银行扩大战略审查范围，将首次公开募股纳入其中
item.description: 瑞典诺巴银行集团（NOBA Bank Group AB）表示正在评估首次公开募股的可能性，这证实了彭博新闻社早些时候的报道。【原文：Swedish lender NOBA Bank Group AB says it’s evaluating a possible initial public offering, confirming an earlier report by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 花旗集团预计未来几个季度亚洲交易活动将增多
item.description: 花旗集团亚太区投资银行业务主管 Jan Metzger 表示，随着印度、台湾和日本等市场的蓬勃发展，以及来自中国的大量交易，亚太区的交易活动将在未来几个季度内增长。【原文：Dealmaking activity in Asia Pacific is set to grow over the coming quarters amid a boom in markets including India, Taiwan and Japan, and a strong pipeline of transactions from China, according to Citigroup Inc.’s head of investment banking in Asia Pacific Jan Metzger.】

item.title: 巴伐利亚北欧集团的大幅反弹只是动荡历史中的最新一例
item.description: 本月巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）股价上涨近 50%，这对这家丹麦疫苗开发商来说并不稀奇。不过，随之而来的下跌也并不常见。【原文：This month’s near 50% rally in Bavarian Nordic A/S shares is nothing unusual for the Danish vaccine developer. But then again, neither are the falls that have often followed.】

item.title: 保诚新业务利润下降 1.4%，主要受中国大陆和香港市场影响
item.description: 保诚集团（Prudential Plc）报告称，受中国大陆、香港和印度尼西亚销售放缓的影响，上半年新业务利润下降了 1.4%。【原文：Prudential Plc reported a 1.4% drop in new business profit for the first half, hit by slower sales in mainland China, Hong Kong and Indonesia.】

item.title: 莱纳斯公司认为中国稀土需求随着价格上涨而上升
item.description: 莱纳斯稀土有限公司（Lynas Rare Earths Ltd.）表示，中国对其材料的需求正在回升，这些材料被广泛应用于风力涡轮机、军事硬件和电动汽车等领域。【原文：Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. said Chinese demand for its materials — used in everything from wind turbines to military hardware and electric vehicles — is picking up, with prices showing signs of recovery following a two-year slump.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为印度公司每年的美元债券销售额将翻一番
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）的一位高管表示，随着美联储发出降低利率的信号，印度企业发行美元债券的步伐将加快，2024 年剩余时间内可能至少销售 40 亿美元。【原文：Indian firms’ dollar bond offerings are set to gather pace with at least $4 billion of sales likely in the rest of 2024, as the Federal Reserve signals lower interest rates, according to a JPMorgan Chase & Co. executive.】

item.title: 中国信贷市场出现 2020 年以来首只浮动利率债券
item.description: 在中国利率处于历史最低水平的情况下，中国一家地方政府融资机构正在出售四年多来国内债券市场上出现的首张浮动利率公司债券。【原文：A Chinese local government financing vehicle is selling the first floating rate corporate note seen in the domestic bond market in more than four years, even as interest rates in the country are at historically low levels.】

item.title: 重量级企业表示担忧，中国钢铁业下滑态势将加剧
item.description: 中国钢铁行业的放缓似乎将进一步加深，全球最大的矿商必和必拓集团有限公司（BHP Group Ltd. ）和最大的铁矿石买家中国宝武集团有限公司（China Baowu Group Ltd. ）都对几十年的增长后需求减弱表示担忧。【原文：China’s steel-industry slowdown looks set to deepen, with BHP Group Ltd., the world’s biggest miner, and China Baowu Group Ltd., the top iron ore buyer, flagging concerns as demand fades after decades of growth.】

item.title: 波音延误迫使非洲顶级航空公司埃塞俄比亚航空租赁飞机
item.description: 波音公司延迟履行订单，迫使非洲最大的航空公司埃塞俄比亚航空公司（Ethiopian Airlines）租赁飞机，以保持其扩张步伐。【原文：Boeing Co.’s delays in fulfilling orders has forced Africa’s biggest carrier, Ethiopian Airlines, to lease aircraft to stay on track with its expansion.】

item.title: 被胡塞武装袭击的红海油轮似乎发生泄漏：五角大楼
item.description: 五角大楼发言人周二表示，8月21日在红海遭到伊朗支持的胡塞叛军袭击的一艘油轮似乎正在燃烧和泄漏。【原文：An oil tanker attacked in the Red Sea by Iran-backed Houthi rebels on August 21 appears to be burning and leaking, a Pentagon spokesman said on Tuesday.】

item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）又抛售了 9.82 亿美元的美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Warren Buffett sold an additional $982 million of Bank of America Corp. stock as his conglomerate continues to shrink its investment in the second-largest US bank.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利 MUFG 和花旗上调目标价，乐天大涨

Ltd.）等券商上调了这家日本电子商务公司的目标股价，原因是其移动业务取得了成功。【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. shares climbed to the highest level since April 2022 after brokerage firms including Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities Co. raised their price target for the Japanese e-commerce firm on its mobile business success.】

item.description: 印度港口工人工会与政府官员达成了一项为期五年的新工资协议，避免了原定于周三举行的全国性罢工。【原文：Port workers’ unions in India agreed to a new five-year wage deal with government officials, averting a planned nationwide strike scheduled for Wednesday.】

item.title: 市场宠儿 Abercrombie & Fitch 将全面回归香港
item.description: 服装零售商阿伯克龙比惠誉公司（Abercrombie & Fitch Co.【原文：Apparel retailer Abercrombie & Fitch Co., which has emerged as one of America’s hottest stocks over the past year, is planning a full-fledged return to Hong Kong eight years after it shut its flagship store in the city, according to people familiar.】

item.title: 美国波士顿银行将牵头为运营商部门交易提供 18.3 亿美元的杠杆贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国银行（Bank of America Corp）已承诺为 Lone Star Funds 收购开利全球公司（Carrier Global Corp.【原文：Bank of America Corp. has committed to financing a $1.83 billion leveraged loan for Lone Star Funds’ purchase of Carrier Global Corp.’s commercial and residential fire unit, according to people familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified as the information is private.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴的 "连接 "会员资格或将成为海外股票的福音
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）即将加入 "股票通"（Stock Connect），这可能会在全球市场释放多达 32 亿美元的现金。分析师称，日本和美国股市是潜在的受益者。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s impending inclusion in the Stock Connect may unleash as much as $3.2 billion of cash across global markets. Analysts say that Japan and US equities are potential beneficiaries.】

item.title: Seven & I 因收购后采取保护措施的消息而下跌
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co. 的股价在东京早盘交易中下跌达 3.8%，此前有消息称，7-Eleven 商店的运营商希望日本政府将其名称改为一个类别，以提高 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. shares fell as much as 3.8% in early morning trade in Tokyo, following news that the operator of 7-Eleven stores wants the Japanese government to change its designation to a category that would raise any potential hurdle for Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. to move forward with its buyout proposal.】

item.title: 穆迪因美国调查而将道明银行评级展望改为负面
item.description: 美国对多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）洗钱控制措施的调查成本不断上升，给这家世界上信用评级最高的银行之一蒙上了一层阴影，穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）紧随竞争对手，将该公司的评级展望定为负面。【原文：The rising cost of a US investigation into Toronto-Dominion Bank’s money-laundering controls is casting a darkening shadow over one of the strongest bank credit ratings in the world, with Moody’s Ratings following rivals in placing a negative outlook on the firm.】

item.title: 繁荣的印度一级市场吸引资金远离高价股
item.description: 印度新股发行的持续热潮吸引了全球基金的目光，他们似乎因印度二级市场的高估值而避而远之。【原文：The ongoing boom in new-share offerings in India has caught the fancy of global funds, who seem to be shunning the nation’s secondary market for its high valuations.】
